data.title: Detection and localization of early
meta_keywords: Sjors G J G In 't Veld
data.meta_description: Cancer patients benefit from early tumor detection since treatment outcomes are more favorable for less advanced cancers. Platelets are involved in cancer progression and are considered a promising biosource for cancer detection, as they alter their RNA content upon local and systemic cues. We show …
data.text:
